Benjamin Adesanya Maja Adekunle (26 Juun, na afọ 1936 na 13 Septemba, na afọ 2014) bụ onye Brigadier nke ndị agha Naijiria na onye isi agha obodo.
A mụrụ Adekunle na Kaduna
Nna ya bụ nwa afọ Ogbomosho, ebe nne ya bụ onye agbụrụ Bachama
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na kọleji gọọmentị, Okene (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Abdul Aziz Atta Memorial College, Okene, na Kogi Steeti nke oge a)
Ọ debara aha na ndị agha Naịjirịa n'afọ 1958 n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ gụsịrị ule asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ ya
Ọ gafere ule nhọpụta ndị agha ma mesịa ziga ya na Royal Military Academy Sandhurst na UK, ụlọ akwụkwọ mbido ndị agha Britain

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke abụọ na Disemba 15, na afọ 1960.  Dị ka onye isi ndị agha, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kasai Province of Congo na 1st Battalion, Queen's Own Nigeria Regiment n'oge njem udo mbụ ya na ONUC UN
N'afọ 1962, Lt
Adekunle ghọrọ Aide-de-Camp nye gọvanọ nke mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ, Sir Akanu Ibiam
N'afọ sochirinụ, dị ka Captain, e zigara ya na Congo dị ka Staff Captain (A) na Nigerian Brigade HQ na Luluabourg - n'okpuru Brigadier B
Babafemi Ogundipe
N'afọ 1964, Major Adekunle gara kọleji ndị ọrụ nchekwa na Wellington, na India
Mgbe ọ laghachiri, a họpụtara ya Adjutant General na isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha na Mee, na afọ 1965 iji dochie Lt
Col
Yakubu Gowon, onye na-aga n'ihu na-aga akwụkwọ na mpụga mba ahụ
Otú ọ dị, o mechara nyefee ọkwa ahụ na Lt
Col
James Pam ma zigara ya na Battalion ochie ya (1st Bn) na Enugu dị ka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ
Adekunle mechara bụrụ onye isi nke Lagos Garrison dị ka Lt
Col

Mgbe Agha Obodo Naijiria malitere na Julaị, na afọ 1967, e nyere Adekunle ọrụ iduzi ihe ndị gụnyere ndị agha ọhụrụ abụọ (7th na 8th) - iji mee mwakpo akụkọ ihe mere eme na Bonny na Bight of Benin na 26 Julaị 1968 (nke Major Isaac Adaka Boro mere)
Nke a mere mgbe gọọmentị etiti nwetara ntụkwasị obi n'ọtụtụ agbụrụ ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ dịka nsonaazụ Biafran na-aga n'etiti ọdịda anyanwụ ma nyochaa mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ
A kwalitere Adekunle ka ọ bụrụ Colonel mgbe Bonny rutere.
Ndị agha nke isii (n'okpuru Major Jalo) na nke asatọ (n'ihi Major Ochefu) nke Lagos Garrison sonyere n'ọrụ iji tọhapụ Midwest mgbe mwakpo Biafran nke Ọgostu, na afọ 1967
Nke asaa (n'okpuru Major Abubakar) nọrọ n'azụ iji jide Bonny
N'ihi na Major Jalo's Unit bụ onye Lt
Col
Ngalaba nke abụọ nke Murtala Mohammed, Adekunle hapụrụ naanị 8th Battalion na Escravos
Ya mere, o mere mkpesa na HQ nke ndị agha wee mee ka ndị agha Lagos dị elu ka Brigade site na ịmepụta 31 na 32 Battalions (n'okpuru Majors Aliyu na Hamman, n'otu n'otu)

Ọdịdị a, jikọtara ya na ndị agha Lagos n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke oké osimiri, a kpọrọ ya 3 Infantry Division. Otú ọ dị, Colonel Adekunle echeghị na aha "3 Infantry Division" bụ ihe na-akpali akpali ma ọ bụ gosipụta ọdịdị nke ala pụrụ iche nke ndị ikom ya ga-alụ ọgụ
Ya mere, na-enweghị nkwado iwu site na HQ nke ndị agha, ọ gbanwere aha ya " 3 Marine Commando (3MCDO)

" "Black Scorpion" dị ka a bịara mara ya, bụ onye kachasị arụmụka, onye a ma ama na onye a na-akọ akụkọ ifo [aha a chọrọ] n'agha nke ịla n'iyi nke tọrọ ntọala maka nsogbu nke oge a nke Naịjirịa; ma tụba  n'ime akwa mba
Benjamin "Ụmụ nwoke Adekunle na Midwest weghara Escravos, Burutu, Urhonigbe, Owa na Aladima
Ha weghara Bomadi na Patani, Youngtown, Koko, Sapele, Ajagbodudu, Warri, Ughelli, Orerokpe, Umutu na Itagba.
A kwalitere Benjamin Adekunle ka ọ bụrụ Brigadier n'afọ 1972
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, e nyere Adekunle ọrụ iwepụ ụgbọ mmiri Lagos nke nwere nsogbu na-adịghị ala ala nke iwepụ ngwongwo si mba ọzọ
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa a ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 20 Ọgọst, na afọ 1974.
O kwuru na nsogbu ya n'oge agha na mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị bụ ndị iro ya na ndị agha
N'ajụjụ ọnụ dị iche iche, o kwuru na a na-ekwu mgbe niile na ọ bụ ya ka a na-akọ na ọ bụ ọchịchị aka ike ruo mgbe ndị agha nwere nchegbu ime ihe banyere ya
O nwere ọtụtụ ndị na-eso ya ma ndị agha ma ọha na eze n'ozuzu ya ma bụrụ onye isi ndị agha kachasị ewu ewu n'oge agha ahụ, ma e wezụga Obasanjo, onye nọchiri ya ma jiri otu 3MC kwụsị agha ahụ.
Adekunle duziri Third Marine Commando Division na nnukwu ọganihu na mkpebi siri ike nke na ndị mgbasa ozi mba ọzọ, na-achọ akụkụ mmadụ na agha Biafran, hụrụ ya dị njikere isi iyi akụkọ.
Ọ nwụrụ na 13 Septemba, na afọ 2014 ma lie ya na Vaults and Gardens, Ikoyi, Lagos
Agha nke Port Harcourt: Col
Adekunle's 3 Marine Commando Div
Igbochi Biafra Ịga Oké Osimiri, May 1968
Ndị agha gọọmentị etiti wakporo Arochukwu, Col
Adekunle's 3 Marine Commando, Nigerian Civil War, July 1968
